channel.title: Marijuana

item.title: Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:3, topic:293002”][quote author=Tree_Climber link=topic=387157.msg2900260#msg2900260 date=1249463979]
I suggest a pipe.
Easiest way imo, that or a bong.
[/quote]Haha, I’m buying one tommorow.[/quote]

Pipe is the easiest way for a begginer since you probably won’t know how to roll joints etc. Best thing to do is to smoke it with your buddy though and he can show you everything lol.

Also keep in mind, weed often doesn’t work the first time or two. It took me like 3-4 tries until I finally got stoned. But you will know for sure when it does work, there is no mistaking the high. Be sure to breathe it deep into your lungs.

Got any pics?

Read full topic

item.title: Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

Ok, so my friend comes over with this hat that has like 10 dime bags in it and I have never smoked weed a day in my life, anyways, his dad is home and in a bad mood so he asks me to keep em at my house and he’s give me 2 to sell or smoke, now, can anyone give me any advice on what to smoke on/on/with, etc;
this is my first time smoking weed, maybe if jme is on he can give me some advice ;D

And I know this is weird asking for smoking advice, but I have no clue what to do.

Read full topic
